original_text: his feet were like burnished bronze, refined in a furnace, and his voice was like the roar of many waters.
korean_text: 그의 발은 풀무불에 단련한 빛난 주석 같고 그의 음성은 많은 물 소리와 같으며

sentences.original_text: his feet were like burnished bronze
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 발은 광이 나는 놋쇠와 같았습니다

sentences.original_text: and his voice was like the roar of many waters
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 음성은 많은 물의 울림과 같았습니다
